channel.title: Python on Schulich Ignite
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Schulich Ignite

item.title: The power of paths
item.description: A path is a way to something. It’s how we go from what we know, and where we are, to what we want to know, and where we want to go.

item.title: Pointers and References in C++
item.description: In many high level coding languages, The idea of a pointer either doesn’t exist, or is hidden from the programmer’s use.
